mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Senator Dirksen shaking the hand of Richard Robinson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Richard A Robinson, Winner of the State Veterans of Foreign Wars annual Voice of Democracy contest, shaking the hand of Senator Everett McKinley Dirksen. Left to right: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr.; Senator Everett Dirksen; Richard Robinson from Fairmont, W.Va.; and State Department Commander Emmett Williams of Beckley.
